channel.title: [562] [Help] Object adding - Case codes
channel.description:
Hello, On my server, I have the smithing skill fully working, besides furnaces not working. Any furnace I tried to use in runescape simply said ' object not added '. So anyway, I got the furnace Id, added where I wanted it. Now I get not error like before. But they simply do not work. I have narrowed it down to that I need to add a case code for the furnace(s) to work. I know the case codes are all in my Object1PacketHandler.
I just do not know what code to add exactly, Can any of you guys help?
Thanks in advance.
